tweets.text: Am I missing something here, how can regulatory bodies decline to be interviewed about companies breaking the law?? @EnvAgency @NatResWales  @Feargal_Sharkey @RiverActionUK  @wrurestore

@SOPH_C_ It‚Äôs bad somewhere everyday @EnvAgencyMids have had 12,000 complaints about the stench from @RedIndustries2 landfill in 3 months @NewsNBC @UHNM_NHS @KeeleUniversity are virtually ‚Äòno go‚Äô zones, environmental crisis @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

The @EnvAgency hadn‚Äôt turned them on - it‚Äôs not just the site that‚Äôs starting to stink üò≥
Has news covered this? Surely it‚Äôs a story where questions should be asked of the agency and council? https://t.co/aEgjoNDBUO
@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Last one mate, have a look at this video. https://t.co/V5KOJPTXe5

Whilst I was in Newcastle town centre yesterday speaking to people having an outdoor pint, I got a whiff of the bad smell which surrounds Walleys Quarry. 

I also hear the smell over the last couple of nights has been bad. Is that right?
This is upsetting and concerning. The air was very bad over the weekend. It‚Äôs really nasty again tonight. @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg https://t.co/fTBO705OCq

@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Exterior of the site such is the breakdown of trust at this point.Local media have reported but we‚Äôre struggling to engage national media,they didn‚Äôt even turn up for the community protest as lockdown eased which was really disappointing. We tweet, we report, it‚Äôs in local news but anything bigger seems to get paid off before they can act.

tweets.text: So when it comes to illegal sewage discharges into UK rivers @EnvAgency does what exactly?

@maireadc_2010 @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @daera_ni How is the legal action funded please? We can't breathe here in Newcastle-under-Lyme. tweets.text: ‚Å¶@StinkStopthe‚Å© There are now 16 very negative comments on this now, well done everyone who made them look stupid and very greedy while they wanted to brag about how wonderful they think they are! I guess they will take it down when they see it! https://t.co/pFVXnx71oP

Simple question @EnvAgencyMids. Why are you not monitoring air quality inside our homes? Our exposure times to the #walleysquarry gases are far longer than anything your MMF is picking up, due to the gases getting trapped in our homes whilst we sleep. #stopthestink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/PrywMHIhJg

@tayz_BETH @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles Hi Nick, thanks for responding and taking time to engage. People really are suffering in their thousands in our town, it has even driven 1 person to attempt suicide.  We have support from our MPs, @AaronBell4NUL & @SimonTagg but nobody seems to be listening. üôÅüôÅ

YOU really SHOULD BE ashamed
@ThamesWater @SouthernWater @YorkshireWater @WelshWaterServ @AnglianWater @WessexWater @SouthWestWater @UnitedUtilities @WaterUK!!
 
Isn't it time that YOU started to do your job @EnvAgency?!! #NotFitForPurpose

#Panorama #TheRiverPollutionScandal https://t.co/1ZAJ3xOiH3

@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Nick, I live 2 miles from this Landfill and right now a foul odour is coming in to my house despite all windows & doors being firmly shut. The owners are notorious for silencing complaints through legal action they even complained about the MP getting involved to the Tory party!

@BBCPanorama #walleysquarrylandfill has had 11.5k complaints to @EnvAgency in 2021 alone. Easily the most important environmental issue in the UK now. The toxic gases are getting into hospitals, schools, homes and causing health problems. Please help! #stopthestink #panorama https://t.co/IXfdiK4qMq

tweets.text:
@StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Someone please help us üò¢
I‚Äôve just been woken up by the 4th asthma attack in the past 24 hours. I can‚Äôt breathe in my own home! I‚Äôm pregnant and I don‚Äôt need this. None of us do.

The state of the environment in England in now getting worse. A stark comment from the Environment Agency chair to Defra secretary George Eustice in a letter released to me under #FOI. EA chair Emma Howard Boyd blames 50% cuts to her enforcement budget. 

https://t.co/P0T4SoCn6O

@MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency One weekend at the end of Feb the @EnvAgency received over a thousand complaints as the smell was so bad. They had installed monitoring facilities so we thought at least they'd have the data to prove the problem.....They hadn't turned them on.

The town has had enough @BBCPanorama @BBCAmos  Can you help us to investigate why the @EnvAgency have failed to stop landfill fumes from polluting the inside of our homes with our doors & windows shut spiralling into thousands of complaints at weekends? @StinkStopthe #panorama https://t.co/pAoafB98x4
